Reviews.Title: Great package
Reviews.Author: Momof2 "Momof1"
Reviews.Content: I was really unsure of what to buy when buying a new DSLR camera, but this package was well-thought out and had lots of things that I didn't even realize I would need!  It shipped earlier than suggested when I ordered, which made me very happy, and everything was as described, with all new Canon equipment in original packaging.  I haven't had much of a chance to get to know the camera and all the pieces that came with it, but so far, it is great.  The camera is light, small and easy to use and the first few preliminary photos are great so I think I'm going to love it!

Reviews.Title: It came with everything I need.
Reviews.Author: Joan A. Tollerud
Reviews.Content: I love my new lightweight SLR camera.  It is easy to use and the pictures are wonderful.  The bundle was a great deal.
